game_description: ** THIS PRODUCT IS IN EARLY ACCESS, IT MAY CONTAIN SOME GLITCHES, because we believe that the best way to develop the game is with the help of the community** UltrasClash V is a physics based, fast paced anime combat!!! Fight hordes of hostile and powerful enemies like cactus head policemen, stupid minionsand giant dinosaur in a desperate, yet unmistakably hilarious, fight for survival. In Ultrasclash V the combat is limited only by your own creativity. Choose your fighting style, choose your weapons, chose you powers. Be the powerful fighter you always dreamed of becoming! FEATURES üëäPunch Movement System: we created a VR locomotion system which allows you to move punching in the direction you choose to move to! ‚ö°Ô∏èSpecial Attacks: Charge up your aura to full power and unleash devastating finishing moves! ‚òÑÔ∏èPhysical engine: we bring you accurate physics feedbacks in addition to badass sounds and enemies! ü¶æMOD KIT Support coming soon...
review_1: Best way to trick you to do gym while raging around as Ken from the fist of the north star or doing Bud Spencer action movies. Looking forward to objects
review_2: It was Ight at first but with the new update it really shows where the game could take off in the future
review_3: This is a very cool game with amazing features, 10/10
review_4: The game is good, the problem is when I'm trying to punch them in the air I go forward and I get stuck in the air and can't move, you can't do much In the game but do the training area and unlock cash and get items, not even the gloves you can get, your cash doesnt even save either, I hope this game can get more features soon.
